DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this porject is to test the Cardiospace system that integrates several medical devices to monitor the cardiovascular system: - ECG - Brachial blood pressure - Continuous finger blood pressure - Ultrasound - Laser doppler + iontophoresis Cardiospace will be used in space station to monitor the cardiovascular system of astronauts for research purpuse.
